 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָפָא‎</span>] **verb** ==thicken, condense, congeal== (compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***heap up, collect***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָֽפְאוּ תְהֹמֹת‎</span> [[Exod.15.8|Exod 15:8]] (song) ***the deeps were condensed***, became firm walls; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יקפאון‎</span> [[Zech.14.6|Zech 14:6]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] (i.e. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקְפָּא֑וּן‎</span> [possible is also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקָּפֵא֑וּן‎</span> **Niph\`al**]) [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] and others glorious(?) ones [stars] ***shall contract*** (dwindle), but read [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְפָּאוֺן‎</span> see following ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַקֹּפְאִים עַלאשִׁמְרַיהֶם‎</span> [[Zeph.1.12|Zeph 1:12]] the men ***who are thickening on their lees*** (easy-going men, under figure of undisturbed wine). **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּקְפִּיאֵנִי‎</span> [[Job.10.10|Job 10:10]] ***didst thou not curdle me*** like cheese (of formation of foetus) ?
